bib.title: Brand-Product Relation Extraction Using Heterogeneous Vector Space Representations
bib.author: Janz, Arkadiusz and Kopoci{\'n}ski, {\L}ukasz and Piasecki, Maciej and Pluwak, Agnieszka
bib.abstract: Relation Extraction is a fundamental NLP task. In this paper we investigate the impact of underlying text representation on the performance of neural classification models in the task of Brand-Product relation extraction. We also present the methodology of preparing annotated textual corpora for this task and we provide valuable insight into the properties of Brand-Product relations existing in textual corpora. The problem is approached from a practical angle of applications Relation Extraction in facilitating commercial Internet
bib.booktitle: Proceedings of the 12th Language Resources and Evaluation Conference
